author: Mario Hofferer
description: “I wanted to keep it simple, clean and fresh and so I decided to mix a twist of my favourite drink - the original Daiquiri. This elegant drink is a great foundation for experimentation. If you're looking for a sugary, frozen, flavoured concoction then this is not the drink for you.”
name: Cantineros Gentleman Daiquiri

recipeInstructions.text: Flambé the rosemary then place into a shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
